about_the_game:
This cute little book is 45 pages of details on the game's creation, character and location development info, guides including collectible items, multiple endings, and multiple scenarios, filled to the brim with character art and screenshots.

As a game developer shoving tutorials on YouTube, I thought it might be fun to let y'all in on my thought process.

The Guidebook can be located under the game's installation directory under the filename GMEMInfoGuideBook.pdf.
